purpose: To present the situation, approach, and results of a marketing strategy.
title: Global Apparel Retailer

bullets.text: Issue: Global apparel retailer was looking to increase ecommerce revenue by driving a new customer base.
Applied Mastercard Audiences to develop a 'look-alike' model based on spend behavior to create two distinct segments.

supporting_facts: Grow online presence with an expanded customer base
Drive online spend from new customers
Frequent online and offline spenders with the retailer
Frequent spenders with the retailer’s competitors
Ran one month campaign within the social and display channel on both mobile and desktop
reasoning_strategy: Descriptive presentation of strategy and outcomes.
data_points: ROI: $350K SPEND YIELDED $1M IN POST CLICK REVENUE
design_language: Clean and corporate with emphasis on key results.
